name: StatsHelper
description: The StatsHelper class provides access to player statistics and achievements in Minecraft. It allows you to retrieve various statistical data about the player's gameplay, including blocks mined, items crafted, entities killed, custom stats, and more.
overview: The StatsHelper class interfaces with Minecraft's native stat tracking system to provide comprehensive access to player statistics. It supports Entity Statistics (kills/deaths), Block Statistics (mined/broken), Item Statistics (usage/crafting/breaking), Custom Statistics, Formatted Display, Bulk Operations, and Server Sync. This helper is typically accessed through Player.getStatistics().

constructors.description: Constructs a new StatsHelper. This constructor is primarily for internal use. Use Player.getStatistics() instead.

parameters.name: statHandler
parameters.description: The underlying Minecraft stat handler object

methods.name: getRawStatValue
methods.description: Retrieves the raw numerical value (ticks, counts, cm) for a specific statistic key.

methods.name: getFormattedStatValue
methods.description: Retrieves the human-readable formatted display string for a specific statistic key.

methods.name: getEntityKilled
methods.description: Gets the count of a specific entity type killed by the player.

methods.name: getKilledByEntity
methods.description: Gets the number of times the player has been killed by a specific entity type.

methods.name: getBlockMined
methods.description: Gets the number of times a specific block has been mined.

methods.name: getItemPickedUp
methods.description: Gets the number of times a specific item has been picked up.

methods.name: getItemUsed
methods.description: Gets the number of times a specific item (tool or consumable) has been used.

methods.name: getItemBroken
methods.description: Gets the number of times a specific item has been broken/depleted.

methods.name: getItemCrafted
methods.description: Gets the number of times a specific item has been crafted.

methods.name: getRawStatMap
methods.description: Retrieves a map containing all available raw statistics keys and their values.

methods.name: getCustomFormattedStat
methods.description: Gets a formatted string for a custom statistic key.

methods.name: getCustomStat
methods.description: Gets the raw value for a custom statistic key.
